GSD.description:
drm/amd/pm: add missing ->fini_xxxx interfaces for some SMU13 asics

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit 22a75c616f1971c23838506b14971a4ef4a66bd7. For more details please see the references link.
